person.persName: Charles Scott Todd Bodley (Lexington, Kentucky, bookseller and sheriff)

body.p: Lexington, Kentucky, bookseller and sheriff. Kentucky native. Married to Frances Curd Bodley. Father of Eleanor H. Bodley, Catherine S. Bodley, and Ann R. Bodley. Bookseller in Fayette County, Kentucky, in 1850 and 1860. Sheriff of Fayette County in 1863. Owned seven enslaved persons and hired one additional enslaved person in 1860.
